#summary Przykłady użycia filtrów
#labels CodeExamples
#sidebar TOCCodeExamplesBasics

*filters.omtt*:
{{{
// let's define a template for use as filter
// trimmer takes a string and returns it back only when shorter than 6 letters
// otherwise, returns 'long'
% def trimmer str.Int
  {
    if str.length < 6: str else: "long"
  }
% end

% def testFilters
  // will show 'long'
  {trimmer "unsophisticated"}

  // it's the same!
  {"unsophisticated" | trimmer}

  // and this too
  {"unsophisticated" apply trimmer}

  // let's check a sequence
  // this will show ("three", "long", "a")
  { ("three", "many many many", "a") | trimmer }

  // this will FAIL
  {trimmer ("three", "many many many", "a")}
% end
}}}
